text:
- [Narrator] Enterprises,
SMBs, and startups alike

face a dilemma when
managing database capacity.
Provision too much and overspend,

or underestimate capacity
needs and risk failures.
With Aurora Serverless v2,
you no longer have to worry about
managing database capacity.

It automatically and instantly
scales database workloads
in a fraction of a second.

As it scales, Aurora
Serverless v2 adjusts capacity
in fine grained increments

to provide just the right
amount of database resources
that the application needs.

And you pay only for
the consumed capacity.
Aurora Serverless v2 supports
all manner of database workloads,

from development and test
environments, websites,
and applications with intermittent
and unpredictable workloads,

to the most demanding
business-critical applications

that require high scale
and high availability.

Now, instead of provisioning
databases for peak loads,
you can use Aurora Serverless v2

to automatically provision
and manage database capacity.
You can save up to 90% in database costs

compared to provisioning
capacity manually.
Start using Aurora Serverless v2 today
to get the most out of your database.
